results.name: Primes p such that 10*p + 7 is also prime.
link: John Cerkan, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..1000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(10*n+7)] // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2010
